title: Digital Calculator
description: This is a simple and modern calculator application built for basic arithmetic operations. It features a clean UI with rounded buttons and a digital display.

title: Weather Web App
description: This is a clean and modern Weather Application built using JavaScript. It allows users to search for any city and view real-time weather details.

title: My Portfolio
